abstract: Former Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer Arnaldo Echevarria is charged with demanding cash bribes and sex from undocumented immigrants in exchange for employment documents and jobs at hair salon he owns; Echevarria reportedly demanded $78,000 in bribes from seven immigrants and had sex with two of them.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors say Arnaldo Echevarria accepted cash bribes and sex from undocumented immigrants for employment documents and jobs at his hair salon.

headline.main: Ex-Deportation Officer Accused of Demanding Bribes and Sex From Immigrants

snippet: Prosecutors say Arnaldo Echevarria accepted cash bribes and sex from undocumented immigrants for employment documents and jobs at his hair salon.
